text: Chamberlain is an unincorporated village in the town of Bristol, Lincoln County, Maine, United States. The community is located along Maine State Route 32 southeast of Wiscasset. Chamberlain has a post office with ZIP code 04541, which opened on September 30, 1905. == Notable residents == * Albinas Elskus, Lithuanian-born stained glass artist ==References== Category:Villages in Lincoln County, Maine Category:Villages in Maine
title: Chamberlain, Maine
